verses.verse: "Even <S%H3117>today<s%> my <S%H7879>complaint<s%> is <S%H4805>rebellious.<s%> His <S%H3027>hand<s%> is <S%H3513>heavy<s%> in spite of my <S%H585>groaning.<s%>
Oh <S%H5414>that<s%> I <S%H3045>knew<s%> where I might <S%H4672>find<s%> <S%H935>him!<s%> That I might come even to his <S%H8499>seat!<s%>
I would set my <S%H4941>cause<s%> in <S%H6186>order<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H4390>him,<s%> and fill my <S%H6310>mouth<s%> with <S%H8433>arguments.<s%>
I would <S%H3045>know<s%> the <S%H4405>words<s%> which he would <S%H6030>answer<s%> <S%H995>me,<s%> and understand what he would tell <S%H559>me.<s%>
Would he <S%H7378>contend<s%> <S%H5978>with<s%> me in the <S%H7230>greatness<s%> of his <S%H3581>power?<s%> <S%H7760>No,<s%> but he would listen to me.
There the <S%H3477>upright<s%> might <S%H3198>reason<s%> with <S%H6403>him,<s%> so I should be delivered <S%H5331>forever<s%> from my <S%H8199>judge.<s%>
"If I <S%H1980>go<s%> <S%H6924>east,<s%> he is not <S%H268>there;<s%> if west, I <S%H995>can't<s%> find him;
He <S%H6213>works<s%> to the <S%H8040>north,<s%> but I <S%H2372>can't<s%> see <S%H5848>him.<s%> He turns <S%H3225>south,<s%> but I <S%H7200>can't<s%> catch a glimpse of him.
But he <S%H3045>knows<s%> the <S%H1870>way<s%> that I <S%H5978>take.<s%> When he has <S%H974>tried<s%> <S%H3318>me,<s%> I shall come forth like <S%H2091>gold.<s%>
My <S%H7272>foot<s%> has <S%H270>held<s%> fast to his <S%H838>steps.<s%> I have <S%H8104>kept<s%> his <S%H1870>way,<s%> and not turned <S%H5186>aside.<s%>

I <S%H4185>haven't<s%> gone back from the <S%H4687>commandment<s%> of his <S%H8193>lips.<s%> I have <S%H6845>treasured<s%> up the <S%H561>words<s%> of his <S%H6310>mouth<s%> more than my necessary <S%H2706>food.<s%>
But he stands <S%H259>alone,<s%> and who can <S%H7725>oppose<s%> <S%H5315>him?<s%> What his soul <S%H183>desires,<s%> even that he <S%H6213>does.<s%>
For he <S%H7999>performs<s%> that which is <S%H2706>appointed<s%> for <S%H7227>me.<s%> Many such things are with <S%H2007>him.<s%>
Therefore I am <S%H926>terrified<s%> at his <S%H6440>presence.<s%> When I <S%H995>consider,<s%> I am afraid of <S%H6342>him.<s%>
For <S%H410>God<s%> has made my <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H7401>faint.<s%> The <S%H7706>Almighty<s%> has terrified <S%H926>me.<s%>
Because I was not cut <S%H6789>off<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H2822>darkness,<s%> neither did he <S%H3680>cover<s%> the thick <S%H652>darkness<s%> from my <S%H6440>face.<s%>
